name: Argoth
description:
Argoth is an FPS game set in future times. The world is in grave danger after an evil entity has entered earth’s galaxy. As Argoth takes over planet by planet someone has to stop him and save planet earth, as well as the other planets in the galaxy. With the different enemies you encounter it’s important you adapt fast to the situation and resources you’ve got. Argoth is a fast-paced game that really gets you on your nerves by constantly letting you face against the different types of demonic entities. Each of these have their unique powers. They are not the only one with powers though, the player is able to use a vast collection of guns and abilities to defeat the enemies.

Enjoy!

*As the game cannot really be played in WebL, you'll have to download it.
